name: Kick Off 2: Winning Tactics
overview: Winning Tactics is a collection of tactics for Kick Off 2, Kick Off 2: The Final Whistle and Player Manager. There are ten Double Tactics available for The Final Whistle and ten Single Tactics for Kick Off 2 and Player Manager. There are a variety of tactics for attacking, defending, setting an Off Side trap in the Final Whistle and to deal with desperate situations for instance attacking when the ball is lost or defending a slender lead against a strong opponent.
